授業の概要・背景: Spring Intensive English is a twice-weekly course tailored for first-year students with advanced English proficiency. It is designed to acclimate students to the standard expectations of university-level English courses. Through active use of English as a tool for completing diverse tasks, students will not only improve their core language skills—reading, writing, listening, and speaking—but also develop crucial academic and professional skills such as idea organization, teamwork, and public speaking.
授業方法: This course will be conducted entirely in English, with a focus on improving students' overall language competencies across all facets of English. Students can expect a highly interactive format, featuring extensive group and pair work that emphasizes discussion, critical thinking, and the synthesis and presentation of ideas. All classes will be taught face-to-face, enhancing the collaborative learning environment.
